html.p: In this course you'll learn many interesting facts about engineering! You'll explore information on different websites, on video clipsÂ and on Google Earth KMZ files. You'll need to "show what you know" in a variety of ways including creating a glog, creating Google Earth presentations and uploading thinking maps.

Topics covered in this course are:
1. What is an Engineer?
2. The 5 Step Design Process
3. Enginnering Wonders
4. Engineers of the Past
Have fun and learn lots, future engineers!
